title: ICE: unexpected failure @ middle::typeck::infer::error_reporting::InferCtxt<'a, 'tcx>.ErrorReporting::give_suggestion

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
This broken code snippet:

``` rust
pub trait Nothing<'a> {
    fn nothing(&'a mut self) -> ();

    fn twice_nothing(&mut self) -> () {
        { self.nothing(); }
        { self.nothing(); }
    }
}
```

Appears to crash the error reporting code:

```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected failure
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
task 'rustc' failed at 'expect item fn', /home/rustbuild/src/rust-buildbot/slave/nightly-linux/build/src/libcore/option.rs:315
```
